projectGridLines.title: Media Mix Modeling: Learn, improve, and standardize existing ROI analysis approach
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

An exciting opportunity to contribute to product building initiatives and standardizing approaches that help in assessing impact of various investments. This engagement will aim at deriving data based actionable suggestions by collaborating with the team to drive direction and find patterns in data which will aid in creating the product and/or automate the existing process for the campaign impact assessment engagements

Skill sets: Data analytics and machine learning, Python, SQL, Excel, PowerBI (good to have)

Traits expectation: Positive attitude, works well with others, learning oriented, Adheres to deadlines and timely communication

Expected learning: Domain expertise and real word data science and analytics experience

Specific courses required for project execution: Prescriptive and predictive analytics

projectGridLines.title: Targeting and Segmentation
projectGridLines.description:
Description: An exciting opportunity to understand and contribute to the personalized customer engagement initiatives for various products by MSD. You will be helping business stakeholders in planning engagement activities for new products and understanding the response for the products in the market. This engagement will aim at deriving data driven actionable suggestions by collaborating with the team to drive direction and find patterns in data which will aid in better customer engagement

Skill sets: Data analytics and machine learning, Python, SQL, Excel, PowerBI (good to have)

Traits expectation: Positive attitude, works well with others, learning oriented, Adheres to deadlines and timely communication

Expected learning: Domain expertise and real word data science and analytics experience

Specific courses required for project execution: Prescriptive and predictive analytics
